author: Ubisoft
description:
Valley of Memory will launch on November 18th! 

Celebrate the two-year anniversary of Assassin’s Creed Mirage with Valley of Memory. This free major update expands Basim’s story, introduces the stunning region of AlUla, and delivers fan-requested gameplay enhancements to the full game.

About Assassin's Creed Mirage:
In Assassin’s Creed Mirage, you are Basim, a cunning street thief with nightmarish visions, seeking answers and justice. After an act of deadly retribution, Basim flees Baghdad and joins an ancient organization – The Hidden Ones. As he learns their mysterious rituals and powerful tenets, he will hone his unique abilities, discover his true nature, and come to understand a new Creed – one that will change his fate in ways he never could have imagined.

#Ubisoft #AssassinsCreed
Learn more about Ubisoft: www.ubisoftgroup.com

title: Assassin's Creed Mirage: Valley of Memory Reveal Stream

author: Ubisoft
description: Hey Riders! In this quick tutorial, we’ll show you how to create your first event in Park Creator!
title: Riders Republic: How to Create Your First Event in Park Creator

author: Ubisoft
description:
Celebrate 30 years of Heroes with new reveals, partnerships and surprises, honoring the franchise’s legacy and the community that keeps it alive.

Join the celebration and follow us on social media: https://linktr.ee/mightandmagic

#HoMM30th #HoMM #HeoresofMightandMagic

About Heroes of Might and Magic:
Step into the world of Heroes of Might and Magic, the turn-based strategy series where you lead powerful heroes, build kingdoms, and command armies of mythical creatures in epic, tactical battles. Discover new factions, creatures, and challenges in a universe that evolves with every installment

#Ubisoft #HoMM

Learn more about Ubisoft: www.ubisoftgroup.com

title: Heroes of Might and Magic: 30th Anniversary Showcase
